sourcesContent:
<template>
	<v-container>
		<v-row justify='center'>
			<v-col cols='6' class='text-h3'>Create Meetup</v-col>
		</v-row>
		<v-row justify='center'>
			<v-col cols='6'>
				<v-form
					@submit.prevent='createMeetup'
					ref='form'
				>
					<v-text-field
						label='Title'
						require
						clearable
						v-model='title'
					></v-text-field>

					<v-text-field
						label='Location'
						require
						clearable
						v-model='location'
					></v-text-field>

					<v-text-field
						label='Image URL'
						require
						clearable
						v-model='imageUrl'
					></v-text-field>

					<v-img :src='imageUrl' :height='imageUrl === "" ? 0 : 200'></v-img>

					<v-textarea
						clearable
						label="Discription"
						v-model='discription'
					></v-textarea>

					 <v-container>
						 <v-row justify='center' align='center'>
								<v-col cols='4'>
									<v-date-picker
										full-width
										v-model="date"
									></v-date-picker>
								</v-col>
								<v-col cols='4'>
									<v-time-picker
										full-width
										format="24hr"
										v-model='time'
									></v-time-picker>
								</v-col>
						 </v-row>
					 </v-container>

					<v-container>
						<v-row>
							<v-btn
								:disabled='!validForm'
								type='submit'
							>Add Meetup</v-btn>

							<v-spacer></v-spacer>

							<v-btn
								@click='reset'
							>Reset</v-btn>
						</v-row>
					</v-container>
				</v-form>
			</v-col>
		</v-row>
	</v-container>
</template>

<script>
	export default {
		data() {
			return {
				title: '',
				location: '',
				imageUrl: '',
				discription: '',
				date: (new Date(Date.now() - (new Date()).getTimezoneOffset() * 60000)).toISOString().substr(0, 10),
				time: ''
			}
		},

		computed: {
			validForm() {
				return this.title !== ''
					&& this.location !== ''
					&& this.imageUrl !== ''
					&& this.discription !== ''
					&& this.time !== ''
			}
		},

		methods: {
      reset () {
        this.$refs.form.reset()
      },
			dateFilter(data) {
				console.log(1)
				const dataFormat = { '01': 'Jan', '02': 'Feb', '03': 'Mar', '04': 'Apr', '05': 'May', '06': 'Jun', '07': 'Aug', '09': 'Sep', '10': 'Oct', '11': 'Nov', '12': 'Dec'}
				console.log(2)
				[year, month, day] = data.split('-')
				console.log(3)
				return `${dataFormat[month]} ${day}, ${year}`
			},
			createMeetup() {
				const meetup = {
					title: this.title,
					location: this.location,
					link: this.imageUrl,
					discription: this.discription,
					date: `${this.dateFilter(this.date)} ${this.time}`,
					id: `${Math.floor(Math.random() * 1000)}`
				}
				this.$store.dispatch('createMeetup', meetup)
				this.$router.push('/meetups/' + meetup.id)
				this.reset()
			}
		}
	}

</script>
